TopicTitle: Why is this game still on the market place?

Articles.Content:
6 minutes ago, nascarlaser1 said:

I do not have console, Go through all the dev notes, at least 1 on the forums is called console patch.

Could you possibly link to that dev blog? I went back to October 2015 and couldn't find a "Dev Note" posting regarding a console patch nor can I find any information regarding a released console patch for KSP with a Google search. 

That fact aside, isn't this discussion still going no where?

4 minutes ago, Bandus said:

Could you possibly link to that dev blog? I went back to October 2015 and couldn't find a "Dev Note" posting regarding a console patch nor can I find any information regarding a released console patch for KSP with a Google search. 

That fact aside, isn't this discussion still going no where?

there isnt a released colsole patch but there is this. perhaps this is what he was talking about

1 minute ago, Galileo said:

there isnt a released colsole patch but there is this. perhaps this is what he was talking about

 

Indeed, I definitely found that one. I expected he specifically meant a dev blog though. Either way, I think we can agree that thread does not discussed a released console patch, let alone multiple released console patches.

27 minutes ago, Galileo said:

there isnt a released colsole patch but there is this. perhaps this is what he was talking about

 

yes thank you. I didn't know it wasn't released yet. sorry guys :(. I did not mean to be mean to anyone. My friend showed me it and told me it was released :(.

1 hour ago, nascarlaser1 said:

yes thank you. I didn't know it wasn't released yet. sorry guys :(. I did not mean to be mean to anyone. My friend showed me it and told me it was released :(.

I think an honest mistake is a great improvement on much of this thread. By the way, I personally love cheese - except goat's cheese, which I can't stand.

7 hours ago, damerell said:

I think an honest mistake is a great improvement on much of this thread. By the way, I personally love cheese - except goat's cheese, which I can't stand.

Couldn't agree more... 

Apart from the cheese of course, I like goat's cheese.  Each to his own I suppose. 

Now this thread will go way off topic discussing the relative merits of Cheddar, Stilton,  and Brie
This is such an unpleasant thread, why don't we talk about other, more happy things?

42 minutes ago, pandaman said:

Couldn't agree more... 

Apart from the cheese of course, I like goat's cheese.  Each to his own I suppose. 

Now this thread will go way off topic discussing the relative merits of Cheddar, Stilton,  and Brie

Do you prefer eating cheese on crackers, plain or in salad?

I prefer crackers

Someone should make a poll.
If you don't like the topic, skip to another thread, please.

4 hours ago, BT Industries said:

Do you prefer eating cheese on crackers, plain or in salad?

I prefer crackers

Someone should make a poll.

I wasn't trying, or wanting, to suggest we carry on talking about cheese, merely trying (and failing) to indicate in a light hearted way that's where it was heading, so I won't answer that.

As I said earlier in the thread, the OP and other console purchasers have a very valid point, and are rightfully disappointed and annoyed that this serious issue has such a negative affect on their enjoyment and experience of KSP.  And yes, the game shouldn't have been released like that, but (for whatever reasons) it was. The players' impatience for a fix is perfectly understandable, but unfortunately expressing it more forcefully won't make it happen any quicker.

A fix can't be 'applied' until it's actually been found, tested and checked, and Squad have said they are on to it.  The causes of some bugs can be much harder to track down than others, so even trying to put a time scale on such things is pointless at best and just asking for trouble at worst.  And then, once fixed, it's at the mercy of whatever protocols the console companies impose before it can be released, which is (afaik) out of Squads hands.

I know it doesn't 'help' asking for patience, but unfortunately there is no alternative.

[snip] coustomers who should be busy playing their shiny new game are instead here complaining... because it doesn't work, so they can't play it.
The answer to a squeaky wheel is oil. The quicker the oil-man cometh, the sooner the squeaking will stop.
Those with a non-functional product have a legitimate reason to be upset. OTOH, if it doesn't concern you, just stroll on by.

What I fail to comprehend is why someone always stops by to complain about all the people complaining. What purpose does that serve?

If this was a physical product, I would have expected it to be pulled from shelves until this was sorted. My guess is that this is not so simple with Sony/MS.

Edited September 1, 2016 by Vanamonde
Quoting removed post.

I asked for some more information regarding the patch in today's Dev note thread and I was completely ignored. The devs are happy to talk about minor tweaks with the Pc players but won't even acknowledge a massive issue for the console. Considering its been six weeks and still no patch/eu release I'm very fearful for the support this game will get on console. Like I said before I really feel that the console players aren't really a part of this community.

12 minutes ago, RW1984 said:

I asked for some more information regarding the patch in today's Dev note thread and I was completely ignored.

Demanding info on future releases release dates is specifically against forum rules and has been for a long time.  PC users already ruined that for you

Also, as explained many times, when it gets released is determined more by Sony and Microsoft than by Squad.

They are not concealing information from you while hoarding your money and evilly twiddling their handlebar mustaches.  You'll know when they do.

Edited August 31, 2016 by Corona688

Demanding info on future releases is specifically against the rules.

Also I think blaming Ms/Sony is weak as it's been six weeks and nothing, approval of patches doesn't take that long. Oh and thanks for the support red iron crown, I'm not posting here to annoy people I'm just incredibly frustrated with this debacle.
